attributes.action: Remove 'Gambling' and ' Pay to Win' from Electronic Arts games
attributes.background: You pay money to open decks/packs to increase the stats of a player slightly. The same player will move faster, complete passes better, score easier if you invest in packs. No certainty what players you get. Then there a children making wagers for coins which can also be purchased for real money

rejection.details:
This petition seems to be calling on Electronic Arts, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action. 

If you want the Government and Parliament to change gambling laws to include gambling in video games which targets children, you may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/201300
